text: Individual RCT SR/MA of cohort studies 2b Individual cohort study (including low quality RCT) SR/MA of case-control studies Individual case-control Study 4 Case series (and poor quality cohort and case-control studies) 5 Expert opinion without explicit critical appraisal, or based on physiology, bench research or “first principles” Abbreviations: CEBM, Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine; MA, meta- analysis; RCT, randomized controlled trial; SR, systematic review. Source: Adapted from OCEBM Levels of Evidence Working Group.5
